name:
Boeing Singapore Training & Flight Services
Pte Ltd
about: Boeing Singapore Training & Flight Services Pte Ltd is a state-of-the-art flight training facility located at 30 Changi North Rise, Singapore. Established in January 2007, it serves as Boeing Flight Services' regional Asia Pacific headquarters. The campus offers comprehensive training solutions for pilots and maintenance personnel, focusing on Boeing aircraft types such as the B-737, B-777, and B-787. Equipped with advanced flight simulators, briefing rooms, and maintenance training facilities, the center ensures safe and efficient operation of airplanes. The facility is committed to providing a pleasant and productive training experience, supported by a team of experienced instructors and staff. Boeing Singapore Training & Flight Services is dedicated to delivering high-quality training to meet the evolving needs of the aviation industry.
